description:
It's no secret that social media is extremely popular. Everyone is using it.

You have an account or profile on either Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Vine, Instagram, YouTube or some other social media website. So do your friends, your family, the corporations you buy products from, the small businesses you buy services from, and heck, even your enemies.

What does everyone ultimately want on their social media profiles, especially businesses? Engagement and traffic. You do this by growing your following and presence on social media. The best way to grow your social media profiles organically is to buy social media services.

This is why I started selling social media services, because they are hugely in-demand! After only a few months of having a few different websites offering services like Facebook Likes, Twitter Followers, and Instagram Likes, I started making over $1300 a month consistently. Besides the initial setup, which wasn't much work, selling these services is so low maintenance (as easy and copying and pasting a link) and even better, the people who want and buy these services will seek you out!

You can do exactly what I do. It's so easy

YOU DON'T NEED TO BE A TECHIE. YOU DON'T NEED TO KNOW ANYTHING ABOUT SELLING SOCIAL MEDIA SERVICES. THIS IS REALLY NEWBIE FRIENDLY AND ANYONE CAN GET A SOCIAL MEDIA STORE UP AND RUNNING WITHIN AN HOUR.

I'm glad to present to everyone: The Social Media Store

I created an easy to follow course, loaded with content to get you set-up and quickly started with selling social media services like Followers and Likes. I have a pre-built, ready to go website, that you can setup in 10 minutes and use that to sell your own social media services. I provide you my personal supplier list, where you pay pennies to sell these services for as much as you wish to charge.

All you need to do is copy my exact, step-by-step method, and collect payments to your PayPal account.

Here's What You Will Receive

  • Over 115 minutes of video instruction in 15 lessons with detailed text summaries
  • Quality and beautiful, pre-built, and ready to install in under 10 minutes social media services website
  • Supplier list to resell these services, pay pennies and charge as much as you wish or use recommended pricing table for huge margins
  • Exactly which social media services to sell, how to sell them, where to sell them
  • How to drive traffic to your store, how to market your store with proven methods and strategies
  • Learn how to sell services like selling Followers, Likes, Views
  • How to maximize your conversions and sales on your store using the best tricks learned from years of trial and error and research
  • Pre-built website is ready to accept transactions, payment processing all set up for you
  • Why pay someone hundreds of dollars to build you a website or buy a pre-built website like this when this course includes one for FREE
  • Newbie friendly, everything is walked through in detail
  • 2 premium WordPress plugins included for free to help drive viral traffic to your website and convert more sales
  • Keyword research done for you, to help choose the best long tail keywords to target and drive quality traffic to your store
  • Over 100 high-quality, 500 word minimum, social media articles for you to use for content or however you wish, also includes strategies on how to best use this content
  • Social Media Plan of Attack e-book showing how to use the power of social media to harness and drive traffic to your websites
  • 30 Day Action Plan to ensure you follow through with the method and come out successful
  • Lifetime VIP support and access to the support forum for life! (Limited time offer)
  • 100% unconditional money-back guarantee
title: The Social Media Store: Learn to sell social media services
